name: Playback speed
description: Enables the playback speed option for all videos and retains the speed configurations in between videos.

name: Fix Google login
description: Allows logging in with a Google account.

name: Settings
description: Adds ReVanced settings to TikTok.

name: SIM spoof
description: Spoofs the information which is retrieved from the SIM card.

name: Show on lockscreen
description: Shows student id and student ticket on lockscreen.

name: Disable dashboard ads
description: Disables ads in the dashboard.

name: Disable Ad-Free Banner
description: Disables the banner with a frog, prompting you to buy Tumblr Ad-Free.

name: Disable in-app update
description: Disables the in-app update check and update prompt.

name: Disable blog notification reminder
description: Disables the reminder to enable notifications for blogs you visit.

name: Disable gift message popup
description: Disables the popup suggesting to buy TumblrMart items for other people.

name: Fix old versions
description: Fixes old versions of the app (v33.2 and earlier) breaking due to Tumblr removing remnants of Tumblr Live from the API, which causes many requests to fail. This patch has no effect on newer versions of the app.

name: Block audio ads
description: Blocks audio ads in streams and VODs.

name: Block embedded ads
description: Blocks embedded stream ads using services like Luminous or PurpleAdBlocker.

name: Block video ads
description: Blocks video ads in streams and VODs.

name: Show deleted messages
description: Shows deleted chat messages behind a clickable spoiler.

name: Auto claim channel points
description: Automatically claim Channel Points.

name: Debug mode
description: Enables Twitch's internal debugging mode.

name: Settings
description: Adds settings menu to Twitch.

name: Unlock downloads
description: Unlocks the ability to download any video. GIFs can be downloaded via the menu on long press.

name: Hide view count
description: Hides the view count of Posts.

name: Dynamic color
description: Replaces the default X (Formerly Twitter) Blue with the user's Material You palette.

name: Change link sharing domain
description: Replaces the domain name of Twitter links when sharing them.

options.title: Domain name
options.description: The domain name to use when sharing links.

name: Open links with app chooser
description: Instead of opening links directly, open them with an app chooser. As a result you can select a browser to open the link with.

name: Sanitize sharing links
description: Removes the tracking query parameters from links before they are shared.

name: Promo code unlock
description: Disables the validation of promo code. Any code will work to unlock all features.

name: Hide ads
description: Hides all in-app ads.

name: Hide ads
description: Adds options to remove general ads.

name: Video ads
description: Adds an option to remove ads in the video player.

name: Copy video URL
description: Adds options to display buttons in the video player to copy video URLs.

name: Remove viewer discretion dialog
description: Adds an option to remove the dialog that appears when opening a video that has been age-restricted by accepting it automatically. This does not bypass the age restriction.

name: Downloads
description: Adds support to download videos with an external downloader app using the in-app download button or a video player action button.

name: Disable precise seeking gesture
description: Adds an option to disable precise seeking when swiping up on the seekbar.

name: Seekbar tapping
description: Adds an option to enable tap-to-seek on the seekbar of the video player.

name: Enable slide to seek
description: Adds an option to enable slide to seek instead of playing at 2x speed when pressing and holding in the video player.

name: Seekbar thumbnails
description: Adds an option to use high quality fullscreen seekbar thumbnails. Patching 19.16.39 adds an option to restore old seekbar thumbnails.

name: Swipe controls
description: Adds options to enable and configure volume and brightness swipe controls.

name: Disable auto captions
description: Adds an option to disable captions from being automatically enabled.

name: Custom branding
description: Applies a custom app name and icon. Defaults to "YouTube ReVanced" and the ReVanced logo.

options.title: App icon
options.description:
The icon to apply to the app.

If a path to a folder is provided, the folder must contain the following folders:

- mipmap-xxxhdpi
- mipmap-xxhdpi
- mipmap-xhdpi
- mipmap-hdpi
- mipmap-mdpi

Each of these folders must contain the following files:

- adaptiveproduct_youtube_background_color_108.png
- adaptiveproduct_youtube_foreground_color_108.png
- ic_launcher.png
- ic_launcher_round.png

name: Change header
description: Applies a custom header in the top left corner within the app. Defaults to the ReVanced header.

options.title: Header
options.description:
The header to apply to the app.

If a path to a folder is provided, the folder must contain one or more of the following folders, depending on the DPI of the device:

- drawable-xxxhdpi
- drawable-xxhdpi
- drawable-xhdpi
- drawable-hdpi
- drawable-mdpi

Each of the folders must contain all of the following files:

- yt_wordmark_header_light.png
- yt_wordmark_header_dark.png

The image dimensions must be as follows:
- drawable-xxxhdpi: 512px x 192px
- drawable-xxhdpi: 387px x 144px
- drawable-xhdpi: 258px x 96px
- drawable-hdpi: 194px x 72px
- drawable-mdpi: 129px x 48px

name: Hide video action buttons
description: Adds options to hide action buttons (such as the Download button) under videos.

name: Navigation buttons
description: Adds options to hide and change navigation buttons (such as the Shorts button).

name: Hide player overlay buttons
description: Adds options to hide the player cast, autoplay, caption button and next/ previous buttons.

name: Change form factor
description: Adds an option to change the UI appearance to a phone, tablet, or automotive device.

name: Hide endscreen cards
description: Adds an option to hide suggested video cards at the end of videos.

name: Disable fullscreen ambient mode
description: Adds an option to disable the ambient mode when in fullscreen.

name: Hide layout components
description: Adds options to hide general layout components.

name: Hide info cards
description: Adds an option to hide info cards that creators add in the video player.

name: Hide player flyout menu items
description: Adds options to hide menu items that appear when pressing the gear icon in the video player.

name: Disable rolling number animations
description: Adds an option to disable rolling number animations of video view count, user likes, and upload time.

name: Hide seekbar
description: Adds an option to hide the seekbar.

name: Hide Shorts components
description: Adds options to hide components related to YouTube Shorts.

options.title: Hide Shorts app shortcut
options.description: Permanently hides the shortcut to open Shorts when long pressing the app icon in your launcher.

options.title: Hide Shorts widget
options.description: Permanently hides the launcher widget Shorts button.

name: Disable suggested video end screen
description: Adds an option to disable the suggested video end screen at the end of videos.

name: Hide timestamp
description: Adds an option to hide the timestamp in the bottom left of the video player.

name: Miniplayer
description: Adds options to change the in app minimized player.

name: Disable player popup panels
description: Adds an option to disable panels (such as live chat) from opening automatically.

name: Remove player controls background
description: Removes the dark background surrounding the video player controls.

name: Exit fullscreen mode
description: Adds options to automatically exit fullscreen mode when a video reaches the end.

name: Open videos fullscreen
description: Adds an option to open videos in full screen portrait mode.

name: Custom player overlay opacity
description: Adds an option to change the opacity of the video player background when player controls are visible.

name: Return YouTube Dislike
description: Adds an option to show the dislike count of videos with Return YouTube Dislike.

name: Wide searchbar
description: Adds an option to replace the search icon with a wide search bar. This will hide the YouTube logo when active.

name: Shorts autoplay
description: Adds options to automatically play the next Short.

name: Open Shorts in regular player
description: Adds options to open Shorts in the regular video player.

name: SponsorBlock
description: Adds options to enable and configure SponsorBlock, which can skip undesired video segments such as sponsored content.

name: Spoof app version
description: Adds an option to trick YouTube into thinking you are running an older version of the app. This can be used to restore old UI elements and features. Patching 19.16.39 includes additional older spoofing targets.

name: Change start page
description: Adds an option to set which page the app opens in instead of the homepage.

name: Disable resuming Shorts on startup
description: Adds an option to disable the Shorts player from resuming on app startup when Shorts were last being watched.

name: Theme
description: Adds options for theming and applies a custom background theme (dark background theme defaults to amoled black).

options.title: Dark theme background color
options.description: Can be a hex color (#AARRGGBB) or a color resource reference.

options.title: Light theme background color
options.description: Can be a hex color (#AARRGGBB) or a color resource reference.

name: Alternative thumbnails
description: Adds options to replace video thumbnails using the DeArrow API or image captures from the video.

name: Bypass image region restrictions
description: Adds an option to use a different host for user avatar and channel images and can fix missing images that are blocked in some countries.

name: Announcements
description: Adds an option to show announcements from ReVanced on app startup.

name: Always repeat
description: Adds an option to always repeat videos when they end.

name: Remove background playback restrictions
description: Removes restrictions on background playback, including playing kids videos in the background.

name: Enable debugging
description: Adds options for debugging.

name: Spoof device dimensions
description: Adds an option to spoof the device dimensions which can unlock higher video qualities.

name: Check watch history domain name resolution
description: Checks if the device DNS server is preventing user watch history from being saved.

name: GmsCore support
description: Allows patched Google apps to run without root and under a different package name by using GmsCore instead of Google Play Services.

options.title: GmsCore vendor group ID
options.description: The vendor's group ID for GmsCore.

name: Bypass URL redirects
description: Adds an option to bypass URL redirects and open the original URL directly.

name: Open links externally
description: Adds an option to always open links in your browser instead of in the in-app-browser.

name: Remove tracking query parameter
description: Adds an option to remove the tracking info from links you share.

name: Spoof video streams
description: Spoofs the client video streams to fix playback.

name: Disable zoom haptics
description: Adds an option to disable haptics when zooming.

name: Force original audio
description: Adds an option to always use the original audio track.

name: Disable HDR video
description: Adds an option to disable video HDR.

name: Remember video quality
description: Adds an option to remember the last video quality selected.

name: Playback speed
description: Adds options to customize available playback speeds, remember the last playback speed selected and show a speed dialog button in the video player.

name: Restore old video quality menu
description: Adds an option to restore the old video quality menu with specific video resolution options.
